ing: 1 pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 mangos - peeled, pitted, and cut into small cubes
2 papayas - halved lengthwise, seeded, peeled, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
des: "A bright, beautiful, and delicious fruit salad. This goes well with jerk chicken or another island meal."
ins: Toss pineapple, mangos, papayas, and bananas together in a large bowl.
